pros: This BOSU dome is an excellent choice for balancing and exercising core muscles
Smaller than the classic BOSU balance trainer, this is a great choice for beginners
cons: May be difficult to inflate with included pump

customer_reviews.title: Good - but smaller than standard size.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, was packaged well and delivered on time. Be aware though that this is a smaller bosu than the standard one you may have used at the gym. It is only 50cm across and although I can use it for some exercises, the inflated part is quite a bit smaller meaning that it’s not quite as high and will affect what you do.
customer_reviews.author: Clair M. Meij

customer_reviews.title: I love the product
customer_reviews.text: This was a royal pain in the butt to inflate but once it was done, I love the product. I bought this as well as a 4 lb bosu ball to do partner training. One person does a crunch with the ball and throws it to the other partner, They throw it back for another crunch. My sadistic trainer loves this exercise and interestingly enough, it's very effective so I love it too. Now back to the bosu ball - it is a tad bit smaller than the ones you see at the gym but I find it perfect for home use. The perky pink color is the icing on the cake. :o)
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: TINY -  Good for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to realize unless you are familiar with the sizes that this is a small bosu - it is not the standard we are used to. This will do virtually nothing for your workout. No benefit. It's like a BABY BOSU. Definitely not worth the price! ANGRY.
customer_reviews.author: arcade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts anywhere, anytime!
customer_reviews.text: I own a commercial-grade BOSU trainer that I use daily at home, but needed a smaller version to use with clients outside of the gym setting. This was exactly what I needed! It's compact, easy to carry around, extremely well-built, and provides everything a traditional BOSU trainer does without taking up too much space. Glad I purchased this travel BOSU trainer!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: What a fantastic BOSU!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact BOSU option for your home gym or to take with you to outdoor workouts. Very sturdy while not being so large that it becomes cumbersome. My home gym is somewhat small, so this option allows me versatility in my workouts without sacrificing space. And LOVE that it's made in the USA!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: The measurements didn't click and I didn't realize how much smaller it was. I was thinking the diameter of the base was smaller as opposed to the ball portion. I got it for my kids (5 & 10) to work on balance for OT activities at home, but it is not a challenge for them at this point. Will return to get the regular size Bosu Ball. Otherwise it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: Two Defective Bosu in a Row
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the first Bosu I ordered that had a tear around the air hole. Now this Bosu isn't holding air. Very frustrating as it's past the return date. Not a cheap product to buy and it's a shame that they aren't well-enough made to last beyond a few months. Very unhappy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lachney

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years of 5 day a week use my bosu sprung a leak. I initially bought one for Tim Ferris type crunches, but found that I use it for simply balance training. I don't do heavy stuff or crazy, but combined with 2 lb indian clubs it makes for a good addition to my morning warm up and active rest between kettlebell sets. Watch "Teutonic lifting" on YouTube and you will get the sense of it. Bottom line, is this is a keeper for training balance in an aging body.
customer_reviews.author: Walker52

customer_reviews.title: Makes strength training so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple piece of equipment but it is amazing how many different things you can do with it. I've been a regular runner and exerciser for a long time and using this Bosu made me sore in ways I hadn't felt in a long time. The instability forces the recruitment of deep abdominal muscles, back, arms ... I'm so much stronger and I was pretty fit to begin with. Really makes me look forward to working out on my strength days! This is a worthwhile investment!
customer_reviews.author: pichu

customer_reviews.title: Extremely fine quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, bright colors and perfect size for my fitness studio. My clients absolutely love to use them. I teach classes with them and they are much more convenient size wise than the full size Bosu. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: rindalee

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: I used Bosu a lot in the gym classes. This one is much more compact compared to the pro version I used at the gym. I love the compact size because I still get the same use out of it without taking up space.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a small home gym!
customer_reviews.text: Super tiny but effective! I got this to use for HIIT training, core work, and as a little bench for elevated push ups, chest presses, etc. It’s much smaller than the bosu balls at the gym, but I actually prefer this size for home use since it’s easier to store. It’s also significantly cheaper than the full size which is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Have been doing PT for back and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Have been doing PT for back and knees - am so totally out of shape! This is great to increase stability and strength. By having some of the PT equipment at home, I can cut down on the visits to the office and do my PT when convenient! Easy to inflate and already I'm improving!
customer_reviews.author: Olive

customer_reviews.title: Great for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these as go to when we can't make it to the gym. They are great for core, working out after injuries andddd the best is the kids are really starting to get into sports so they use it work on their balance. This is the same exact quality as the BOSU ones at the fancy gym we go to. It has little rubber pads to not muck up the hardwood floors and it slides under the bed thank goodness, too!
customer_reviews.author: groovyfashionmonster

customer_reviews.title: Great size for travel and smaller stature folks.
customer_reviews.text: At 5’3” tall, I found the standard size BOSU to be too big for my step up and over physical therapy exercise. This smaller travel size is perfect! I can step off the front of the BOSU without clipping my heel on the hard rim. I also find it easier to store and lighter to move. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bosu but bigger than ‘Travel Size’
customer_reviews.text: The bosu is much bigger than ‘travel size’ but when inflated are tough to stand on with flat side up. Bosu’s at my gym are a little larger and more stable when inflated.
customer_reviews.author: WCdad

customer_reviews.title: Love the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I knew I was getting the smaller bosu ball. It’s perfect. Takes up less space and still totally functional. Even with Instructions, it takes a few minutes to figure out how to blow up the ball correctly. Refer to you tube videos. They’re helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great for balance!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting a Bosu for some time and am very happy with the purchase and the product. It’s great for helping to improve balance and I like using It for uneven squats and also for lunges with one foot elevated. We did have to use a tire inflator to inflate it as the hand pump was taking forever. Once we put it on the electric tire inflator that we already had, it filled it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie E. Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, just pricey
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is sturdy and of good quality. In my case, it was not the easiest to pump; the tube kept popping out so I had to hold it in with one hand, hold it on it's side so the air can flow in while also pumping the air in. A bit complicated to do with only two hands. I've felt the need to inflate it a bit more on a couple of occasions so far. For the amount of money I spent on this I just expected better ease to get it set up. The trainer itself does it's thing as promised. But the initial set up & maintenance for the price have been disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joczi

customer_reviews.title: good product but watch out the Bosu sport is smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: good product but watch out the Bosu sport is smaller than the original....... I wish I had noticed earlier, I would have exchanged it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ITS SMALL
customer_reviews.text: IT IS THE SMALL VERSION. I had no idea the Original had been redesigned to be so small. Yes, it's clearly stated .. but, I had no idea I needed to study the explanation. I am disappointed in the new size. Isn't good for what I need. Other than how SMALL/SHORT it... this seems to be similar to the Original Bosu. But, like a Midget compared to the Rock..
customer_reviews.author: Coach

customer_reviews.title: Must have for a home gym
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to any home gym. Easy to inflate and has held up well after daily use for a few months. Feels very sturdy and well built. Great size!
customer_reviews.author: natalie

customer_reviews.title: Terrific core strength and stability as well as balance and proprioception trainer, and fun, too!
customer_reviews.text: I've used my Bosu Balance Trainer since exercises were given to me in PT following knee surgery. One feature that Bosu could improve is to include a small device to aid in pulling out the stop that must be removed in order to periodically inflate the balance trainer. We have always used a pliers, which works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Like it though
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit I did not realize that I bought the smaller one, I was usuing the larger one in the gym. Like it though, it's the same and it takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: Sugar

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, LOUSY pump
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter for Christmas. The ball itself is great and performs as it should. The pump that was sent with it, however, is JUNK!!!! it is the cheapest piece of plastic, foot pump I have ever seen. The pump did NOT EVEN begin to air up the ball and then the cheap plastic nozzle broke completely off the pump. SO, order the Bosu ball,it's great, just have another pump handy in order to air it up.
customer_reviews.author: shoppinmom

customer_reviews.title: Great product for balance
customer_reviews.text: Worked out on a Bosu ball under fitness instructor and found it helped with stability and balance (in my 80s). Now that gym is closed my instructor recommended this product for home use. So glad that I got it.
customer_reviews.author: 4setterman

customer_reviews.title: Green is the new Black?
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the ball in Blue/Black. It came in Blue/Green. Really? Not worth sending back, but its the little things!
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Home Gym
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the smaller size while waiting for it to arrive. After inflating it my concern vanished. With my feet resting over the handles ball-side down, it's the perfect width for squats. Material seems very sturdy. **There is not valve to prevent air spewing out after you remove the provided hand pump. I suggest inflating an extra 1/4" to get the perfect pressure.**
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my active youngster
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to inflate, sturdy and a fun addition for my active child.
customer_reviews.author: chris tie

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Colorful. We tried it out right away and it worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby K.

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to inflate
customer_reviews.text: After 30 minutes of inflating the ball had barely expanded. Hand pumping for 2-3 hours to inflate it? No way, I returned it. I gave it 3 stars because I can't honestly comment on how it worked because we never used it.
customer_reviews.author: KMB

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend Bosu Sports Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love my Bosu balance trainer! It was easy to inflate and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very good quality and looks like it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very good quality and looks like it will hold up for a LONG time. Price was good. Didn't have a single problem blowing it up like some of the other reviewers had. The pump is however a cheap piece of junk so don't expect it to last long. I threw it out after I blew up the balance trainer as I have another pump that is a quality pump that will work with this.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Runner

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one at the gym.
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. Was easy to pump up and it's just like the one I use at the gym. Definitely Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D

customer_reviews.title: It is shown with an item to inflate it. ...
customer_reviews.text: It is shown with an item to inflate it. I just opened and there is nothing to inflate it or any directions. HELP
customer_reviews.author: mary spencer

customer_reviews.title: Fun colors for great excercise
customer_reviews.text: Fun color and good quality bosu- no problems jumping against it, balancing on it, or lunging from it- knee rehab has put this bosu through its paces and its done well every time. The included pump works well and is far superior to any of the little hand pumps that sometimes are included.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Didn't arrive in good shape
customer_reviews.text: I used one of these balls while in physical therapy and was excited to get mine. However, it wouldn't inflate. We called customer support at the manufacturer and they walked us through poking a hole in the air inlet. Apparently the machinist didn't do his job. Then we realized we didn't get the plug for the air hole either. So now we wait for the plug...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good Bosu
customer_reviews.text: Its a little smaller than the ones in my gym. But still works great. I wish the black surface was a bit smoother, its a little difficult to stand barefoot on that side. For some reason it came in a box the size of a refrigerator. Too much packing material...too much waste.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Small version, but nice
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, just like its normal size version. I only gave it 4 stars because I expected the regular size
customer_reviews.author: Diana Gruenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plug and Pump
customer_reviews.text: Got the Bosu ball but there were no instructions. Went to Amazon and found the instruction manual which said it should have come with a plug and pump. Really annoyed it’s missing these pieces and I can’t use it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Marell Jandacka Morel

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and well produced.
customer_reviews.text: Recovering for a 5 point ankle injury and surgery. This piece is heavy and does the job. Several 250 guys tried to do what I was doing for my exercises and found it's harder than it looks. I'll be doing this long after the recovery is done.
customer_reviews.author: Eve UrAlly

customer_reviews.title: These are smaller than the ones you will find at the physical therapy clinic
customer_reviews.text: Same quality as the ones at the physical therapy cynic, simply smaller and less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: FiestyBerry

customer_reviews.title: Great Bosu ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner for Christmas - he loves it! It seems very durable and came with a pump. We were impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Missing Piece
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with the plug to stop air from coming out....total bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lee Enright

customer_reviews.title: but it is a perfect item to work on balance/core strength
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I don’t use as often as I should, but it is a perfect item to work on balance/core strength.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey N.

customer_reviews.title: Good for all workouts.
customer_reviews.text: Before the pandemic I used to use this in the gym for burpees. But know with the gym still being closed I use for pushups, squats and a variety of other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: JOHNNY HUDSON

customer_reviews.title: Nice price for durable Bosu
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions. Easy to inflate to proper pressure. Exact copy of what I used in the gym
customer_reviews.author: robert nielson

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my tennis classes. Kids bounce on it all day. It is durable and easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Missing part
customer_reviews.text: Hey the plug to make sure the air doesn’t go out never came with the product. I blow it up and it deflates immediately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smaller sports bosu in order to do some Pilates-style backbending exercises. I just received it and inflated and it is very sturdy and exactly what I had wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: The size and durability is fine. The issue is the product arrived without the pump or the plug to keep it inflated. Luckily I received a pump with my exercise ball and was able to remove a plug from another ball to make this work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Workouts.
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING for squats! I've had this product for a few months now, and I feel a huge difference when I work out with my BOSU vs. when I am on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe R.

customer_reviews.title: For anyone that has used a bosu at the gym ...
customer_reviews.text: For anyone that has used a bosu at the gym, this bosu is a lot smaller than those you find in the gym. Almost designed for a kid
customer_reviews.author: Traci A Moser

customer_reviews.title: Really like the Bosu ball
customer_reviews.text: The pump was a toy, couldn't get it to pump up the Bosu ball but a son-in-law used his small compressor, Really like the Bosu ball, now to find more time to use it. Fun to do. I'm almost 78 and I will use it for balance. So far, so good! Glad there is such a good product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does its job and lets me have great burning ab workouts. Easy to inflate.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: I love the bright colors on the Bosu Sport Balance Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love the bright colors on the Bosu Sport Balance Trainer. I bought it for my granddaughter's birthday and she loves it. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its nice because its smaller than an indoor trampoline and everyone ...
customer_reviews.text: i got this for my kids mainly for xmas. its nice because its smaller than an indoor trampoline and everyone in the house can use it. stores easily. now we just need a few bosu tips/ workouts. its still fun for our 3 year to just bounce on.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well, for the exercise routine my wife uses it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it really helps on the work outs , I use it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Don C.

customer_reviews.title: Yes! 🩰
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a ballerina and it’s great to build ankle strength and also work on her balance! It’s not too big or small and easy to inflate!
customer_reviews.author: Porsha Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bosu
customer_reviews.text: Had some trouble at first trying to inflate this and had a slight mishap of my own doing. But I got it inflated and am very happy with it. I love to use it at the gym and am loving the convenience of having one at home now too.
customer_reviews.author: pamelac3

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! I stand on this all day at ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT! I stand on this all day at work - either side.
customer_reviews.author: KMW33

customer_reviews.title: Probably will never by a used item though amazon ever again
customer_reviews.text: Got my Bosu Ball and it did not come with the pump to blow it up or the plug to prevent it from deflating. This was my first used product purchase and I am not impressed. I paid a little under $80 and I feel like I totally got screwed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LaPrad

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it was a smaller version of what we use in class. Otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: K-LO from the Block

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been great so far for core training. guide book was helpful with helpful hints easy to set up. getting heavy use and still in great shape. kids want another so they can train together.
customer_reviews.author: salesman4

customer_reviews.title: Execute yoga classes.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter-in-law like trainer balance .She use it in yoga classes.
customer_reviews.author: Connie TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Love the bright pink colour ... just like photo
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: This is a smaller version of the Bosu you are probably using at the gym!
customer_reviews.text: This ball, though attractive, is smaller than the one my wife wanted. We ended up getting the larger one. I wish I had known, but thats to no fault of the products!
customer_reviews.author: Michael H Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Offers the best support for lower back when doing crunches!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Fraher

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece but good product
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with a plug, does not hold air. Besides that the quality of this item is on point.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this small Bosu. Works great for travel when hopping from client to client and works great with adults.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Resille

customer_reviews.title: BOSU doesn't BLOW UP
customer_reviews.text: Just received..was so excited. and then this happened - The plastic foot pump is a JOKE, as I've just read in other reviews..it doesn't even blow Bosu up, the hose pops off if you don't hold it in place..but that doesn't matter because you would be trying to blow this up until 2017... I resorted to my electric air pump! The Bosu did rise with air..but mine does not inflate all the way as instructions state it should. It inflates with little air rising only to 5". Instructions say inflate to 7" mine won't budge anymore than barely 5" TRUELY disappointed !! RETURNING
customer_reviews.author: WendylmR

customer_reviews.title: The pump did not work well, but CS at ...
customer_reviews.text: The pump did not work well, but CS at BOSU explained the issue and was able to get it done. It is exactly as advertised so when they fix the issue I think it will be worth 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Sun and Sea

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This came exactly as I hoped, with all the parts. It was very easy to inflate & is great for at-home workouts & balance training!
customer_reviews.author: Elena Fike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, wonderful product. Great way to get in shape in the comfort of your own home. Works really, really well. 5 star seller. HIGHLY recommended!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn V.

customer_reviews.title: Bosu for Home Use
customer_reviews.text: This was smaller than I anticipated but it works our okay for home use. Price was good and delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: We love this mini BOSU. Serves it's purpose for a portable trampoline-type thing, and stabilizer/strength builder. I use it all the time for therapy and exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna B.

customer_reviews.title: Construction and style what I expected but def not the ...
customer_reviews.text: Construction and style what I expected but def not the durability of other Bosu I have used climically. It's too early to tell if it will uphold load and perform as well.
customer_reviews.author: liz uppleger

customer_reviews.title: Great for Core Workout
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family is now using this for exercise. It provides a great workout with lots of different kind of exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Barcan

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Super sturdy and well made. We have used this constantly for several months and it looks like new. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. A bit smaller than the one I use at my gym, but will still get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: naasahin

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball! It's the only one I found for under 150$, it's durable, and has held up to the different things I've put it through so far. I flip it over and stand on the flat part, and it does just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shhay

customer_reviews.title: Happy! :)
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. The Bosu was exactly what I was looking for and was delivered very promptly, no delays and earlier than expected. YAY!
customer_reviews.author: Donna/BookTiger

customer_reviews.title: I ASKED TO TRADE IT FOR A 24 INCH SIZE HOPING IT WILL HOLD AIR AND BE MORE STURDY!
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS TOO SMALL AND LEAKED AIR OUT OF THE FITTING. I SENT IT BACK. I ASKED TO TRADE IT FOR A 24 INCH SIZE HOPING IT WILL HOLD AIR AND BE MORE STURDY!
customer_reviews.author: GEORGEANN GAMBLE

customer_reviews.title: Bosu Sport Balance Trainer
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. I used one while in therapy after total knee replacement. I still use this to strengthen my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Verna Christian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for one-leg balance exercises and other cross-fit routines. Love the size.
customer_reviews.author: Lolo

customer_reviews.title: Great Balance Trainer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this Bosu ball, everything I expected it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Morey

customer_reviews.title: Good but you will need a better inflator to pump this up
customer_reviews.text: I like Bosu Balls - they give a great workout and are great for balance! The reason this got 4 stars is that the manual pump included with it is a piece of junk. The hose that connected to the pump on one end and the Bosu on the other would "fly off" the connection as soon as I depressed the pump. I was able to use an electric tire inflator, because my inflator had the appropriate nozzle adaptor. Otherwise I am not sure how it could have been inflated. FYI I gave the same item to my niece and she had the same problem, so I think this is a product design issue.
customer_reviews.author: njworkoutqueen

customer_reviews.title: ... smaller than I thought it would be but works great for me
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than I thought it would be but works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Slightly smaller than the original bosu
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Slightly smaller than the original bosu, but it works great. Shipped fast. The air pump takes forever to use, so I recommend using a different kind.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, delivered when promised. I use it every day and my balance has greatly improved
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: ... have no idea if the balance trainer is any good because the pump that came with it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if the balance trainer is any good because the pump that came with it is a piece of useless plastic that wont inflate the trainer.
customer_reviews.author: one brit

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It's a good exercise tool but the flat surface doesn't have a smooth surface
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great workout tool
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because the pump is so crappy and hard to use but the bosu ball itself is great and I love using it
customer_reviews.author: Stay at home military spouse/mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: just reminding buyers this is a smaller version. Still recommend
customer_reviews.author: John kosar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to my home gym. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bosu
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bosu. Hard to blow up with the pump they send but I used a bike foot pump and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: CLT

customer_reviews.title: Add to your fitness equipment.
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a personal trainer and really likes this BOSU ball. It's sturdy and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chaveso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great color. Perfect size for a small woman or teen.
customer_reviews.author: Keleidescope

customer_reviews.title: Great Size and Works Great for Sit-ups
customer_reviews.text: I have this smaller version and a full size one. I use them because my tail bone hurts when I do sit-ups. This removes all discomfort. The size of this smaller version allows me to set it out of the way easier than the full size Bosu.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan T. Bennett

product_meta.title: Bosu Sport Balance Trainer - Travel Size
feature_bullets: Balance ball trainer for strengthening and coordinating core muscles
Strengthens, trims, and tones while improving balance and coordination
Combines physical and mental focus; measures 50 cm in diameter
Holds up to 250 pounds, includes pump and exercise manual
Measures 19.7 inch diameter x 7 inch high when fully inflated, base is approximately 22", proudly made in the USA
